ca.cgjennings.ui

Interface GestureToolkit.Provider

  • Enclosing class:
    GestureToolkit

    public static interface GestureToolkit.Provider
    This interface bridges the toolkit to a specific backing implementation. See the class description for GestureToolkit for information on how a provider implementation is selected.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attachTo(JRootPane root, GestureListener listener)
      Attaches the gesture provider to a window or other top-level component.
      void detachFrom(JRootPane root, GestureListener listener)
      Detached the gesture provider from a window or other top-level component.
      List<String> getCustomGestureIDs()
      Returns a list of the IDs of any custom gestures supported by the provider.

    • Method Detail

      • attachTo

        void attachTo(JRootPane root,
              GestureListener listener)
        Attaches the gesture provider to a window or other top-level component. When gestures occur while the top-level component associated with the root pane has focus, the specified listener will be called to handle those events.
        Parameters:
        root - the root pane of the window interested in events
        listener - the listener to call

      • detachFrom

        void detachFrom(JRootPane root,
                GestureListener listener)
        Detached the gesture provider from a window or other top-level component. The specified listener will no longer be called when events occur while the associated window has focus.
        Parameters:
        root - the root pane of the window interested in events
        listener - the listener to call

      • getCustomGestureIDs

        List<String> getCustomGestureIDs()
        Returns a list of the IDs of any custom gestures supported by the provider. May return null if no custom IDs are used.
        Returns:
        a list of custom IDs, or null
